Arby's http://www.dexknows.com/business_profiles/arby_s-l823179321/ (208) 762-3653 181 W Prairie Ave , Hayden , ID 83835 47.7446919 -116.7895219 Send to Phone Visit Website View Menu Write a Review Reviews by John M. - 10/03/2011
Poor food, slovenly, uncaring service, employees who are so busy talking among themselves they neglect the front counter.
Stay away from this place.
To see how a good fast food restaurant is and should... Read Full Review on Yelp.com.
